Quality.name: Ambidextrous
Quality.notes: Suffer no dice pool modifier for performing actions soley with off-hand

Quality.name: Analytical Mind
Quality.notes: +2 dice pool modifier to Logic tests

Quality.name: Aptitude
Quality.notes: One skill rated at 7 at creation, raisable to 13 (instead of 6/12)

Quality.name: Astral Chameleon
Quality.notes: -2 d.p.m. to anyone assensing astral signatures left behind by the character

Quality.name: Bilingual
Quality.notes: Get a 2nd free language skill

Quality.name: Blandness
Quality.notes: +1 threshold to recall specific details about the character. -2 d.p.m to all test related to searching for the character in a populated setting

Quality.name: Catlike
Quality.notes: +2 dice pool modifier to Sneaking skill tests

Quality.name: Codeslinger
Quality.notes: +2 dice pool modifier to chosen matrix action

Quality.name: Double-Jointed
Quality.notes: +2 dice pool modifier to Escape Artist tests

Quality.name: Exceptional Attribute
Quality.notes: +1 to maximum limit of chosen attribute. (Not edge)

Quality.name: First Impression
Quality.notes: +2 dice pool modifier to relevant Social tests when first meeting someone

Quality.name: Focused Concentration
Quality.notes: Sustain one spell/compelx form with force/level equal to this rating without penalty

Quality.name: Gearhead
Quality.notes: Increase Speed of vehicle or drone by 20% OR increase Handling modifier by +1. +2 dice pool modifier when attempting difficult maneuvers. Lasts 1D6 minutes

Quality.name: Guts
Quality.notes: +2 dice pool modifier on tests to resist fear and intimidation

Quality.name: High Pain Tolerance
Quality.notes: Ignore RATING boxes of damage when calculating wound modifiers

Quality.name: Juryrigger
Quality.notes: +2 dice pool modifier to Mechanical tests when juryrigging

Quality.name: Lucky
Quality.notes: +1 to maximum limit of Edge

Quality.name: Magical Resistance
Quality.notes: +1 dice pool modifier (per level) to Spell Resistance Tests

Quality.name: Natural Athlete
Quality.notes: +2 dice pool modifier to Running and Gymnastics skill tests

Quality.name: Natural Hardening
Quality.notes: +1 point of natural biofeedback filtering

Quality.name: Photographic Memory
Quality.notes: +2 dice pool modifier to all Memory tests

Quality.name: Quick Healer
Quality.notes: +2 dice pool modifier to Healing tests made on/for/by the character

Quality.name: Resistance to pathogenes
Quality.notes: +1 dice pool modifier to Resistance Tests against pathogens

Quality.name: Resistance to toxins
Quality.notes: +1 dice pool modifier to Resistance Tests against toxins

Quality.name: Spirit Affinity
Quality.notes: 1 additional service for each spirit of chosen type. +1 d.p.m. for Binding tests

Quality.name: Toughness
Quality.notes: +1 dice pool modifier to Damage Resisctance tests

Quality.name: Will to Live
Quality.notes: +1 Damage Overflow Box per level

Quality.name: Addiction (Mild)
Quality.notes: 1 dose/1 hour of activity once a month

Quality.name: Addiction (Moderate)
Quality.notes: 1 dose/1 hour of activity every two weeks

Quality.name: Addiction (Severe)
Quality.notes: 2 dose/2 hour of activity once a week

Quality.name: Addiction (Burnout)
Quality.notes: 3 dose/3 hour of activity daily

Quality.name: Allergy (Uncommon)(Mild)
Quality.notes: -2 d.p.m. to Physical Tests while experiencing symptoms

Quality.name: Allergy (Uncommon)(Moderate)
Quality.notes: -4 d.p.m. to Physical Tests while experiencing symptoms

Quality.name: Allergy (Uncommon)(Severe)
Quality.notes: -4 d.p.m. to Physical Tests while experiencing symptoms. 1 box of Physical Damage per minute exposed to allergen

Quality.name: Allergy (Uncommon)(Extreme)
Quality.notes: -6 d.p.m. to Physical Tests while experiencing symptoms. 1 box of Physical Damage per 30sec exposed to allergen

Quality.name: Allergy (Common)(Mild)
Quality.notes: -2 d.p.m. to Physical Tests while experiencing symptoms

Quality.name: Allergy (Common)(Moderate)
Quality.notes: -4 d.p.m. to Physical Tests while experiencing symptoms

Quality.name: Allergy (Common)(Severe)
Quality.notes: -4 d.p.m. to Physical Tests while experiencing symptoms. 1 box of Physical Damage per minute exposed to allergen

Quality.name: Allergy (Common)(Extreme)
Quality.notes: -6 d.p.m. to Physical Tests while experiencing symptoms. 1 box of Physical Damage per 30sec exposed to allergen

Quality.name: Astral Beacon
Quality.notes: Character astral signatures lasts twice as long. Others assensing it receive -1 Threshold modifier

Quality.name: Bad Luck
Quality.notes: When using Edge roll 1D6. On a 1, the point is spent but has the opposite effect as intended.

Quality.name: Code of Honor
Quality.notes: Must make a Charisma+Willpower (4) Test when attempting to kill a member of chosen group

Quality.name: Codeblock
Quality.notes: -2 dice pool modifier to chosen matrix action

Quality.name: Combat Paralysis
Quality.notes: On first Initiative Test uses half Initiative score. -3 d.p.m. on Surprise Tests

Quality.name: Dependent(s)
Quality.notes: See Rulebook

Quality.name: Distinctive Style
Quality.notes: +2 d.p.m. to identifying, tracing, locating the character. -1 Threshold on related Memory Tests

Quality.name: Gremlins
Quality.notes: 1 less rolled 1s to get a glitch (per level) when using a moderatly sophisticated device.

Quality.name: Incompetent
Quality.notes: Incompetent in chosen skillgroup.

Quality.name: Insomnia (Mild)
Quality.notes: Intuition+Willpower(4) Test before rolling to recover Stun damage. If failed, healing time is doubled, and no edge is recovered for 24h.

Quality.name: Insomnia (Severe)
Quality.notes: Intuition+Willpower(4) Test before rolling to recover Stun damage. If failed, no damage and no edge is recovered.

Quality.name: Loss of Confidence
Quality.notes: -2 dice pool modificator to chosen skill. Skill specialization not useable.

Quality.name: Low Pain Tolerance
Quality.notes: -1 wound modifier for every 2 boxes of damage instead of every 3.

Quality.name: Scorched
Quality.notes: Must pass a Body+Willpower(4) test not to suffer chosen sideeffects

Quality.name: Simsense Vertigo
Quality.notes: -2 dice pool modifier to all tests interacting with AR,VR,simsense

Quality.name: Social Stress
Quality.notes: Number of 1s for a glitch reduced by 1 when using Leadership or Ettiquette skills

Quality.name: Spirit Bane
Quality.notes: -2 d.p.m. for Summoning or Binding Spirits of chosen type. +2 d.p.m. for Spirit when trying to Banish

Quality.name: Uncouth
Quality.notes: -2 d.p.m. to all Social Tests to resist acting improperly or impulsively.

Quality.name: Uneducated
Quality.notes: Unaware in Technical, Academic and Professional Knowledge skills character doesn't possess.

Quality.name: Unsteady Hands
Quality.notes: After stressfull encounters: Agility+Body(4) Test, if failed -2 d.p.m. for Agility based tests for the rest of the run

Quality.name: Weak Immune System
Quality.notes: Power of any disease +2 for every Resistance Test
